an9.34:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā sāriputto rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
an9.34:4.2: Tatra kho āyasmā sāriputto bhikkhū āmantesi:
an9.34:4.5: Evaṃ vutte, āyasmā udāyī āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ etadavoca:
an9.34:4.6: “kiṃ panettha, āvuso sāriputta, sukhaṃ yadettha natthi vedayitan”ti?
an9.34:4.7: “Etadeva khvettha, āvuso, sukhaṃ yadettha natthi vedayitaṃ.
an9.34:4.10: Cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā, sotaviññeyyā saddā … pe …
an9.34:4.13: kāyaviññeyyā phoṭṭhabbā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā—
an9.34:4.15: Yaṃ kho, āvuso, ime pañca kāmaguṇe paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ, idaṃ vuccatāvuso, kāmasukhaṃ.
an9.34:5.3: Tassa ce, āvuso, bhikkhuno iminā vihārena viharato kāmasahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti, svassa hoti ābādho.
an9.34:5.4: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, sukhino dukkhaṃ uppajjeyya yāvadeva ābādhāya;
an9.34:5.7: Yo kho panāvuso, ābādho dukkhametaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā.
an9.34:5.8: Imināpi kho etaṃ, āvuso, pariyāyena veditabbaṃ yathā sukhaṃ nibbānaṃ. (1)
an9.34:6.1: Puna caparaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā … pe …
an9.34:6.3: Tassa ce, āvuso, bhikkhuno iminā vihārena viharato vitakkasahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti, svassa hoti ābādho.
an9.34:6.4: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, sukhino dukkhaṃ uppajjeyya yāvadeva ābādhāya;
an9.34:6.7: Yo kho panāvuso, ābādho dukkhametaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā.
an9.34:6.8: Imināpi kho etaṃ, āvuso, pariyāyena veditabbaṃ yathā sukhaṃ nibbānaṃ. (2)
an9.34:7.1: Puna caparaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu pītiyā ca virāgā … pe …
an9.34:7.3: Tassa ce, āvuso, bhikkhuno iminā vihārena viharato pītisahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti, svassa hoti ābādho.
an9.34:7.4: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, sukhino dukkhaṃ uppajjeyya yāvadeva ābādhāya;
an9.34:7.7: Yo kho panāvuso, ābādho dukkhametaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā.
an9.34:7.8: Imināpi kho etaṃ, āvuso, pariyāyena veditabbaṃ yathā sukhaṃ nibbānaṃ. (3)
an9.34:8.1: Puna caparaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahānā … pe …
an9.34:8.3: Tassa ce, āvuso, bhikkhuno iminā vihārena viharato upekkhāsahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti, svassa hoti ābādho.
an9.34:8.4: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, sukhino dukkhaṃ uppajjeyya yāvadeva ābādhāya;
an9.34:8.7: Yo kho panāvuso, ābādho dukkhametaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā.
an9.34:8.8: Imināpi kho etaṃ, āvuso, pariyāyena veditabbaṃ yathā sukhaṃ nibbānaṃ. (4)
an9.34:9.1: Puna caparaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu sabbaso rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamā paṭighasaññānaṃ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārā ananto ākāsoti ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati.
an9.34:9.2: Tassa ce, āvuso, bhikkhuno iminā vihārena viharato rūpasahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti, svassa hoti ābādho.
an9.34:9.3: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, sukhino dukkhaṃ uppajjeyya yāvadeva ābādhāya;
an9.34:9.6: Yo kho panāvuso, ābādho dukkhametaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā.
an9.34:9.7: Imināpi kho etaṃ, āvuso, pariyāyena veditabbaṃ yathā sukhaṃ nibbānaṃ. (5)
an9.34:10.1: Puna caparaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ samatikkamma anantaṃ viññāṇanti viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati.
an9.34:10.2: Tassa ce, āvuso, bhikkhuno iminā vihārena viharato ākāsānañcāyatanasahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti, svassa hoti ābādho.
an9.34:10.3: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, sukhino dukkhaṃ uppajjeyya yāvadeva ābādhāya;
an9.34:10.6: Yo kho panāvuso, ābādho dukkhametaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā.
an9.34:10.7: Imināpi kho etaṃ, āvuso, pariyāyena veditabbaṃ yathā sukhaṃ nibbānaṃ. (6)
an9.34:11.1: Puna caparaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ samatikkamma, natthi kiñcīti ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati.
an9.34:11.2: Tassa ce, āvuso, bhikkhuno iminā vihārena viharato viññāṇañcāyatanasahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti, svassa hoti ābādho.
an9.34:11.3: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, sukhino dukkhaṃ uppajjeyya yāvadeva ābādhāya;
an9.34:11.6: Yo kho panāvuso, ābādho dukkhametaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā.
an9.34:11.7: Imināpi kho etaṃ, āvuso, pariyāyena veditabbaṃ yathā sukhaṃ nibbānaṃ. (7)
an9.34:12.1: Puna caparaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samatikkamma nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati.
an9.34:12.2: Tassa ce, āvuso, bhikkhuno iminā vihārena viharato ākiñcaññāyatanasahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti, svassa hoti ābādho.
an9.34:12.3: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, sukhino dukkhaṃ uppajjeyya yāvadeva ābādhāya;
an9.34:12.6: Yo kho panāvuso, ābādho dukkhametaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā.
an9.34:12.7: Imināpi kho etaṃ, āvuso, pariyāyena veditabbaṃ yathā sukhaṃ nibbānaṃ. (8)
an9.34:13.1: Puna caparaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu sabbaso nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samatikkamma saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ upasampajja viharati, paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā honti. (9)
an9.34:14.1: Imināpi kho etaṃ, āvuso, pariyāyena veditabbaṃ yathā sukhaṃ nibbānan”ti.
